mapper.select: select fd_id, fd_name, fd_loginname as fd_loginName, fd_email, fd_mobile, fd_password, fd_token, fd_status from tbl_users where fd_mobile=#{fd_mobile}
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_users (fd_name, fd_loginname, fd_email, fd_mobile,fd_password,fd_token,fd_status) values (#{fd_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fd_loginName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fd_email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fd_mobile,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{fd_password,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{fd_token,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{fd_status,jdbcType=CHAR})
